text: Judo was an event at the Island Games, the biennial multi-sports event for island nations, territories and dependencies. Judo first appeared as a sport at the Island Games in 1989 Minimum age - 13 ==Events== Judo had a twelve year absence from the Island Games then was discontinued after 2009. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
